PackageOracle.name: DA_MODEM_POLLING
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_MODEM_POLLING
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.01.063377000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,cmts_id IN NUMBER
,modem_mac_addr_id IN VARCHAR2
,ev_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,eqmnt_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,cmts_rx_snr_meas IN NUMBER
,cmts_rx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_rx_snr_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_rx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_tx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,micro_refl_meas IN NUMBER
,corr_meas IN VARCHAR2
,uncor_meas IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,cmts_id IN NUMBER
,modem_mac_addr_id IN VARCHAR2
,ev_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,eqmnt_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,cmts_rx_snr_meas IN NUMBER
,cmts_rx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_rx_snr_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_rx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_tx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,micro_refl_meas IN NUMBER
,corr_meas IN VARCHAR2
,uncor_meas IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,msr_ev_id IN NUMBER
,cmts_id IN NUMBER
,modem_mac_addr_id IN VARCHAR2
,ev_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,eqmnt_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,cmts_rx_snr_meas IN NUMBER
,cmts_rx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_rx_snr_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_rx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_tx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,micro_refl_meas IN NUMBER
,corr_meas IN VARCHAR2
,uncor_meas IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,msr_ev_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_modem_polling;

body.name: DA_MODEM_POLLING
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_MODEM_POLLING
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.01.075992000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,cmts_id IN NUMBER
,modem_mac_addr_id IN VARCHAR2
,ev_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,eqmnt_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,cmts_rx_snr_meas IN NUMBER
,cmts_rx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_rx_snr_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_rx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_tx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,micro_refl_meas IN NUMBER
,corr_meas IN VARCHAR2
,uncor_meas IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem_polling.add(fx), parms=' || cmts_id || '|' || modem_mac_addr_id || '|' || ev_dttm || '|' || eqmnt_prod_inst_id || '|' || cmts_rx_snr_meas || '|' || cmts_rx_power_meas || '|' || modem_rx_snr_meas || '|' || modem_rx_power_meas || '|' || modem_tx_power_meas || '|' || micro_refl_meas || '|' || corr_meas || '|' || uncor_meas || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_modem_polling a
(
a.msr_ev_id
,a.cmts_id
,a.modem_mac_addr_id
,a.ev_dttm
,a.eqmnt_prod_inst_id
,a.cmts_rx_snr_meas
,a.cmts_rx_power_meas
,a.modem_rx_snr_meas
,a.modem_rx_power_meas
,a.modem_tx_power_meas
,a.micro_refl_meas
,a.corr_meas
,a.uncor_meas
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_msr_ev_id.NEXTVAL
,add.cmts_id
,add.modem_mac_addr_id
,add.ev_dttm
,add.eqmnt_prod_inst_id
,add.cmts_rx_snr_meas
,add.cmts_rx_power_meas
,add.modem_rx_snr_meas
,add.modem_rx_power_meas
,add.modem_tx_power_meas
,add.micro_refl_meas
,add.corr_meas
,add.uncor_meas
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.msr_ev_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem_polling.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,cmts_id IN NUMBER
,modem_mac_addr_id IN VARCHAR2
,ev_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,eqmnt_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,cmts_rx_snr_meas IN NUMBER
,cmts_rx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_rx_snr_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_rx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_tx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,micro_refl_meas IN NUMBER
,corr_meas IN VARCHAR2
,uncor_meas IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem_polling.add, parms=' || cmts_id || '|' || modem_mac_addr_id || '|' || ev_dttm || '|' || eqmnt_prod_inst_id || '|' || cmts_rx_snr_meas || '|' || cmts_rx_power_meas || '|' || modem_rx_snr_meas || '|' || modem_rx_power_meas || '|' || modem_tx_power_meas || '|' || micro_refl_meas || '|' || corr_meas || '|' || uncor_meas || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_modem_polling a
(
a.msr_ev_id
,a.cmts_id
,a.modem_mac_addr_id
,a.ev_dttm
,a.eqmnt_prod_inst_id
,a.cmts_rx_snr_meas
,a.cmts_rx_power_meas
,a.modem_rx_snr_meas
,a.modem_rx_power_meas
,a.modem_tx_power_meas
,a.micro_refl_meas
,a.corr_meas
,a.uncor_meas
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_msr_ev_id.NEXTVAL
,add.cmts_id
,add.modem_mac_addr_id
,add.ev_dttm
,add.eqmnt_prod_inst_id
,add.cmts_rx_snr_meas
,add.cmts_rx_power_meas
,add.modem_rx_snr_meas
,add.modem_rx_power_meas
,add.modem_tx_power_meas
,add.micro_refl_meas
,add.corr_meas
,add.uncor_meas
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem_polling.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,msr_ev_id IN NUMBER
,cmts_id IN NUMBER
,modem_mac_addr_id IN VARCHAR2
,ev_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,eqmnt_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,cmts_rx_snr_meas IN NUMBER
,cmts_rx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_rx_snr_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_rx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,modem_tx_power_meas IN NUMBER
,micro_refl_meas IN NUMBER
,corr_meas IN VARCHAR2
,uncor_meas IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem_polling.add, parms=' || msr_ev_id || '|' || cmts_id || '|' || modem_mac_addr_id || '|' || ev_dttm || '|' || eqmnt_prod_inst_id || '|' || cmts_rx_snr_meas || '|' || cmts_rx_power_meas || '|' || modem_rx_snr_meas || '|' || modem_rx_power_meas || '|' || modem_tx_power_meas || '|' || micro_refl_meas || '|' || corr_meas || '|' || uncor_meas || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_modem_polling a
(
a.msr_ev_id
,a.cmts_id
,a.modem_mac_addr_id
,a.ev_dttm
,a.eqmnt_prod_inst_id
,a.cmts_rx_snr_meas
,a.cmts_rx_power_meas
,a.modem_rx_snr_meas
,a.modem_rx_power_meas
,a.modem_tx_power_meas
,a.micro_refl_meas
,a.corr_meas
,a.uncor_meas
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.msr_ev_id
,add.cmts_id
,add.modem_mac_addr_id
,add.ev_dttm
,add.eqmnt_prod_inst_id
,add.cmts_rx_snr_meas
,add.cmts_rx_power_meas
,add.modem_rx_snr_meas
,add.modem_rx_power_meas
,add.modem_tx_power_meas
,add.micro_refl_meas
,add.corr_meas
,add.uncor_meas
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem_polling.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,msr_ev_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem_polling.del, parms=' || msr_ev_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_modem_polling a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.msr_ev_id = del.msr_ev_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem_polling.del');

END del;

END da_modem_polling;
